Installation¶

There is an experimental version of an NWelch package available from TestPyPI. Install with

$ pip install -i https://test.pypi.org/simple/ NWelch

If the pip installation doesn’t work for you, the next-best thing is to clone the GitHub repository and place the source code somewhere in your python path.

NWelch
